definition: of a speech expressing leave-taking, a farewell oration, especially one delivered during graduation exercises by an outstanding member of a graduating class
details:
adjective
- of a speech expressing leave-taking
= example: of a speech expressing leave-taking
noun
- a farewell oration, especially one delivered during graduation exercises by an outstanding member of a graduating class
= example: a farewell oration, especially one delivered during graduation exercises by an outstanding member of a graduating class
= synonyms: valediction
